title: LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washing Machine with TurboWash™ 360
description: The LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washing Machine with TurboWash™ 360 offers cutting-edge features for efficient and effective laundry care. This high-capacity front-load washer provides a 4.5 cubic feet drum, perfect for handling large loads. It features TurboWash™ 360 technology that uses high-pressure jets to clean your clothes thoroughly in less time. The AI DD™ feature intelligently detects the weight and fabric softness to optimize wash motions, ensuring the best care for your clothes. Enjoy the convenience of Wi-Fi connectivity with the LG ThinQ® app, which allows you to monitor and control your wash cycles remotely. The machine also includes Steam™ technology to sanitize your laundry. Its sleek white design complements any laundry room decor. Experience the ultimate in washing efficiency with the LG WM4000HWA.
meta_title: LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washing Machine with TurboWash™ 360
meta_description: Buy the LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washing Machine with TurboWash™ 360. Features include AI DD™, Wi-Fi connectivity, Steam™ technology, and a sleek white design.

title: LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer with AI DD™ and Steam™ Technology
description: The LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer offers advanced technology and superior performance for all your laundry needs. Featuring a 4.5 cubic feet drum, this washer accommodates large loads with ease. It includes AI DD™ technology that detects fabric type and optimizes washing motions for gentle care. The TurboWash™ 360 feature provides a deep clean with high-pressure jets in less time, while Steam™ technology helps to remove stains and sanitize clothes. The washer also offers Wi-Fi connectivity through the LG ThinQ® app, allowing you to control and monitor wash cycles from your smartphone. With its modern white finish and advanced features, the WM4000HWA is a top choice for efficient and effective laundry care.
meta_title: LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer with AI DD™ and Steam™ Technology
meta_description: Shop the LG WM4000HWA 4.5 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer with AI DD™ and Steam™ Technology. Features TurboWash™ 360, Wi-Fi connectivity, and a sleek white finish.
